original_title: 人情凌●シリーズ 夢見る美女と変態親父たちの六畳物語 夏目彩春
overview: Iroha is a beautiful woman who dreams of becoming a novelist and works hard. The residents of the run-down apartment she lives in show her supportive behavior, but their ulterior motives are exposed. When she asked, he took advantage of her, who couldn't refuse, and hit her middle-aged father's obscenity.
title: Compassionate Rape Series. The 6-Mat Story Of An Ambitious Beauty And Perverted Men Iroha Natsume
